name: Leak Bali
description:
If you have ever been to Bali, you will be familiar with the Leak Dance which is often presented in the Calonarang dance performance at cultural events such as the Galungan Festival. In addition, the show is also often performed as a ritual when a disease outbreak occurs in a village in Bali. As the show's name implies, the mystery about Leak comes from a supernatural being named Calonarang who is the highest ruler of breeding or the science of Leak in Balinese.
According to Balinese belief, Leak is a human who studies magic. But the magic is not balanced with good behavior. That said, the bad side of the figure appears at night where the Leak hunts a small boy in order to need embryonic blood in order to live. It is also said that Leak can turn himself into a pig or a ball of fire, while the real form of Leak has a long tongue and sharp teeth. Some people say that Leak magic only works on the island of Bali, so Leak is only found in Bali.
